text: Barbara Hackman Franklin (born March 19, 1940) is an American politician and businesswoman. She was the 29th United States Secretary of Commerce from 1992 to 1993 to President George H. W. Bush.Stout, Lee. "A Matter of Simple Justice: The Untold Story of Barbara Hackman Franklin and a Few Good Women." Penn State Libraries, 2012. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Commerce Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Barbara Franklin
